plot: Already haunted by the loss of his best friend, Will must now deal with a defense team that is out to make sure he does not financially benefit from the accident.
title: Frozen Peas
plot_es: Already haunted by the loss of his best friend, Will must now deal with a defense team that is out to make sure he does not financially benefit from the accident.
plot_en: Already haunted by the loss of his best friend, Will must now deal with a defense team that is out to make sure he does not financially benefit from the accident.
